value:
$WmMPID_幼少ラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Before21,Face|Oh, thank goodness! I'm happy to
have found someone else out here...
Would you kindly guide me?$k$p$WmMPID_エフラム,ch08_01_Eirik_FM_Pair,Face|Hold on now! People just keep
appearing from nowhere... Where
are you all coming from?$k$pAnd who are you, exactly?$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Before21,Face|My... Everyone just wants to know
who I am! Not that I can blame them,
of course.$k$p$WmMPID_比翼エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_FM_Pair,Face|Right, so tell us who you
are already.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ヒーニアス,ch08_03_Heanius_M_Before21,Face|Ah, Ephraim! I never imagined we
would find you out here!$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ターナ,ch08_05_Turner_F_Before21,Face|Oh! And Eirika's here too!$k$p$WmMPID_幼少リオン,ch08_12_Lyon_M_Before21,Face|Um... I beg your pardon, but if we
stay here any longer, we'll—$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_比翼エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_FM_Pair,Face|Oh, look! We've nearly reached the
edge of the forest!$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ターナ,ch08_05_Turner_F_Before21,Face|Ooh! We might actually make it home!
Now that I'm not so worried, I'm just
realizing I've started to get hungry...$k$p$WmMPID_エフラム,ch08_01_Eirik_FM_Pair,Face|I found some fruit earlier. Anyone
is welcome to some if they'd like.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ヒーニアス,ch08_03_Heanius_M_Before21,Face|Ephraim! You shouldn't dole out fruit
you know nothing about. You ought
to make sure it isn't poison first!$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Before21,Face|Mm-mmm! Delicious! Truly, this
is a blessing from the gods!$k$p$WmMPID_幼少リオン,ch08_12_Lyon_M_Before21,Face|...Hee hee hee.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ヒーニアス,ch08_03_Heanius_M_Before21,Face|Hm? And just what is it you find
so funny about this situation?$k$p$WmMPID_幼少リオン,ch08_12_Lyon_M_Before21,Face|O-oh... I'm sorry. It's just...this is the
first time I've ever been around so
many others near my age.$k$pI hadn't known chatting in a group
like this would be such fun.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Before21,Face|Same here, now that you mention it!
I'm always stuck surrounded by sooo
many adults...$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ヒーニアス,ch08_03_Heanius_M_Before21,Face|And? What's the problem with that?
Why should children get to know
other children, hm?$k$pThis is the time when we should
prioritize learning as much as we
can from our elders.$k$p$WmMPID_比翼エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_FM_Pair,Face|But there is also much one can learn
from their friends.$k$p$nMPID_エフラム|Eirika's right! Father said a friend is
something that ought to be treasured
for a lifetime.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ヒーニアス,ch08_03_Heanius_M_Before21,Face|O-of course! ...It's not as if I don't
know all that!$k$pBut we nobles have responsibilities!
We are different from common
children.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ターナ,ch08_05_Turner_F_Before21,Face|So, what? You're saying you and
Ephraim aren't friends then? Well...
we're friends, aren't we, Eirika?$k$p$WmMPID_比翼エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_FM_Pair,Face|We are! You're a friend I hold
dear, Tana.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ヒーニアス,ch08_03_Heanius_M_Before21,Face|Hah! Ephraim and I? Friends?!
Don't make me laugh!$k$p$WmMPID_幼少リオン,ch08_12_Lyon_M_Before21,Face|Heh... Hah... Ahahaha!$k$p$Sbs3000|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|H-huh? What...what is this?
I'm suddenly...very...sleepy...$k$p$WmMPID_エフラム,ch08_01_Eirik_FM_Pair,Face|N-no...way... Did our...pursuers...$k$p...$k$p$Sbs1500|$Fo1500,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face|$SbpBGM_MENU_TENRO,0|$Fi1500|...I will step in here. It is time to bring
this trial to its close.$k$pYour memories of this day will
be lost, children, and you will be
returned to your lives.$k$pHowever, the connection that lives
in the depths of your hearts will
remain and bring you strength.$k$pThis alone I will refrain from erasing.
May you carry it with you and draw
from it in future battles.$k$pBe you allies or, as it may happen,
mortal enemies, wield the strength
you have sown here today.$k$p$Sbs150|
